info.title: Socio-demo API
info.description: Socio-demo API can be used to obtain time-aggregated data representing groups of people on the given location in the Czech Republic. Having a location, the API can return count of people belonging to age group or gender aggregated by hours. The socio-demo data is based on presence of mobile stations in O2 mobile network.

get.summary: Presence in a location aggregated by age
get.description: Get count of people in a given location and an hour, aggregated by age.

parameters.name: occurenceType
parameters.description: occurence type in the basic residential unit (1 - transit, 2 - visit)

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: time interval for the count aggregation (from 0 to 23)

204.description: The request is valid, but the platform is not able to serve the data. The reason may be restriction (e.g. differential privacy) or no data were found.

400.description: Invalid request provided, missing or invalid parameter.

get.summary: Presence in a location aggregated by gender
get.description: Get count of people in a given location and an hour, aggregated by gender.

parameters.name: occurenceType
parameters.description: occurence type in the basic residential unit (1 - transit, 2 - visit)

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: time interval for the count aggregation (from 0 to 23)

204.description: The request is valid, but the platform is not able to serve the data. The reason may be restriction (e.g. differential privacy) or no data were found.

400.description: Invalid request provided, missing or invalid parameter.

get.summary: Information about versions of application and data.

count.description: Final count as the result of the request

backendDataFrom.description: For which day are data valid
